title: OMG Twitch.tv, can you not?
body:
https://ih0.redbubble.net/image.425098862.1291/flat,900x900,070,f.u2.jpg

Remember the old League of Legends image that twitch has had for forever? They changed it...

TO THIS:

https://i.imgur.com/WDgitOF.jpg

good luck sleeping tonight....

(also the .tv was for clarity, not twitch the champion also sorry for the massive WutFace, i  didn't think it'd be such a large image on the boards x_x)
